trans-unit.source: Initialize a new instance of Pool.
trans-unit.target: Initialize a new instance of Pool.

trans-unit.source: Initialize a new instance of Pool.
trans-unit.target: Initialize a new instance of Pool.

trans-unit.source: The target OS Version ("*" default to the latest OS Version for the specified OS Family).
trans-unit.target: The target OS Version ("*" default to the latest OS Version for the specified OS Family).

trans-unit.source: The timeout for allocation of TVMs to the pool.
trans-unit.target: The timeout for allocation of TVMs to the pool.

trans-unit.source: The target count of TVMs for this pool.
trans-unit.target: The target count of TVMs for this pool.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether auto scaling is enabled for the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether auto scaling is enabled for the pool.

trans-unit.source: The auto scale formula (required if enableAutoScale is true).
trans-unit.target: The auto scale formula (required if enableAutoScale is true).

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether tasks running on TVMs in the pool need to be able to communicate directly with each other.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether tasks running on TVMs in the pool need to be able to communicate directly with each other.

trans-unit.source: A task that will be run on each TVM in the pool to set up the execution environment for the pool.
trans-unit.target: A task that will be run on each TVM in the pool to set up the execution environment for the pool.

trans-unit.source: A list of certificates that need to be installed on the TVMs of the pool.
trans-unit.target: A list of certificates that need to be installed on the TVMs of the pool.

trans-unit.source: Name value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.
trans-unit.target: Name value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.
